de.unihd.dbs.uima.annotator.heideltime.utilities

Class ContextAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unihd.dbs.uima.annotator.heideltime.utilities.ContextAnalyzer

  • public class ContextAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods that work with the dependence of a subject with its surrounding data; namely via the jcas element or a subset list.
    Author:
    jannik stroetgen
